労働人口: (ろうどうじんこう) - work force
労働党: (ろうどうとう) - Labour Party; Labor Party; worker's party
労働分配率: (ろうどうぶんぱいりつ) - labor's share (of income)
労働力: (ろうどうりょく) - labor; labour; manpower; working force
労働力不足: (ろうどうりょくぶそく) - labor shortage (labour)
労働力人口: (ろうどうりょくじんこう) - labor force; labour force
労働力削減: (ろうどうりょくさくげん) - workforce reduction
労働力率: (ろうどうりょくりつ) - labor force participation rate; labour force participation rate
労働協約: (ろうどうきょうやく) - labor agreement; labour agreement
労働収容所: (ろうどうしゅうようしょ) - labor camp; labour camp

労働基本権: (ろうどうきほんけん) - basic labor rights; basic workers' rights
労働基準: (ろうどうきじゅん) - labor standard; labor standards (e.g. bureau, law)

労働基準法: (ろうどうきじゅんほう) - Labor Standards Act

労働契約書: (ろうどうけいやくしょ) - labour contract (labor)

労働市場: (ろうどうしじょう) - labor market; labour market
労働攻勢: (ろうどうこうせい) - labor offensive; labour offensive
労働時間: (ろうどうじかん) - working hours; man-hours
労働条件: (ろうどうじょうけん) - working conditions
労働権: (ろうどうけん) - the right to work
労働歌: (ろうどうか) - songs of labor; songs of labour
労働法: (ろうどうほう) - labor law; labour law
労働法典: (ろうどうほうてん) - labor code (labour)
労働災害: (ろうどうさいがい) - work-related injury or death
労働災害補償: (ろうどうさいがいほしょう) - workers' compensation
労働生産性: (ろうどうせいさんせい) - labor productivity; labour productivity
労働相: (ろうどうしょう) - Minister of Labor (Labour)
労働省: (ろうどうしょう) - Ministry of Labour (now Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare)
労働祭: (ろうどうさい) - Labor Day; May Day
労働組合: (ろうどうくみあい) - labor union; labour union
労働組合法: (ろうどうくみあいほう) - (Japanese) Labor Union Law
労働者: (ろうどうしゃ) - employee/worker; laborer (labourer)/blue-collar worker
労働者派遣業: (ろうどうしゃはけんぎょう) - manpower business; manpower agency
労働者派遣法: (ろうどうしゃはけんほう) - Temporary Staffing Services Law
労働者災害補償保険: (ろうどうしゃさいがいほしょうほけん) - workers' accident compensation insurance
労働者階級: (ろうどうしゃかいきゅう) - working class
労働者集会: (ろうどうしゃしゅうかい) - labor rally; labour rally
労働能率: (ろうどうのうりつ) - labor efficiency (labour)
労働許可証: (ろうどうきょかしょう) - work permit
労働運動: (ろうどううんどう) - labour movement; labor movement
労働運動者: (ろうどううんどうしゃ) - labor agitator; labour agitator
労働金庫: (ろうどうきんこ) - workers' credit union; labour credit association
労働関係調整法: (ろうどうかんけいちょうせいほう) - labor relations adjustment law (labour)
労働階級: (ろうどうかいきゅう) - working classes
労働集約: (ろうどうしゅうやく) - labour intensive
労働集約産業: (ろうどうしゅうやくさんぎょう) - labour intensive industry
労働集約的産業: (ろうどうしゅうやくてきさんぎょう) - labor-intensive industry; labour-intensive industry
労力: (ろうりょく) - labour; labor; effort; toil; trouble
労力を省く: (ろうりょくをはぶく) - to save labor; to save labour
労動: (ろうどう) - manual labor/manual labour/toil/work; Labour Party
労動者: (ろうどうしゃ) - employee/worker; laborer (labourer)/blue-collar worker
労務管理: (ろうむかんり) - labor management; labour management
労務課: (ろうむか) - labor section; labour section
労多くして功少なし: (ろうおおくしてこうすくなし) - all pain and no gain; lots of pain and not much gain
労役: (ろうえき) - work; labor; labour; toil
労役場: (ろうえきじょう) - prison labor camp; prison labour camp
労政: (ろうせい) - labor administration; labour administration
労災: (ろうさい) - work-related injury/work-related illness/work-related death/on-the-job accident; workers' compensation insurance
労災保険: (ろうさいほけん) - worker's accident insurance
労組: (ろうくみ) - labor union; labour union
労資: (ろうし) - capital and labor; capital and labour; capitalists and laborers; capitalists and labourers
労農党: (ろうのうとう) - labor-farmer party; labour-farmer party
労連: (ろうれん) - labour union; labor union
労金: (ろうきん) - workers' credit union; labour credit association
労銀: (ろうぎん) - wages; labor wages; labour wages
効: (kou/ki) - effect , efficacy, benefit, efficiency, effect, result, success
効かせる: (きかせる) - to season (with salt, etc.)/to bring out taste; to use/to exercise/to display
効がある: (こうがある) - to be beneficial to; to be efficacious
効が有る: (こうがある) - to be beneficial to; to be efficacious
効き: (きき) - (効き often refers to medicine) effectiveness/efficacy/efficaciousness; (利き only) dominance (e.g. of left or right hand); (利き only)  tasting (alcohol, tea, etc.)
効く: (きく) - to be effective/to show effect; to do its work/to carry out its function well; to be possible to use
効を奏する: (こうをそうする) - to succeed; to bear fruit
効力: (こうりょく) - effect; efficacy; validity; potency
効果: (kouka) - effect, effectiveness, efficacy, result; effects (por exemplo, efeitos sonoros, efeitos visuais, efeitos especiais)
効果が上がる: (こうかがあがる) - to bear fruit; to take effect
効果の法則: (こうかのほうそく) - law of effect
効果抜群: (こうかばつぐん) - (yoji) exceptionally effective; overwhelming effectiveness
効果覿面: (こうかてきめん) - (yoji) bring an immediate result on; have an instant effect on
